document_data.name: Giran
document_data.mainbody:
'''Giran''' was a commoner child of [[Hannah]] from the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]], the capital of [[Amn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''My momma went into the tent to see a show. But somethin' happened, and now nobody comes out. There's guards who won't let nobody in anymore, too. But my momma's in there! I want my momma!''|Giran}}
document_data.History: in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Giran and his mother visited a circus performing at the center of Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Center District|Center District]], in [[Waukeen's Promenade]]. Unfortunately, the circus' tent fell victim to a mad [[gnome]] [[illusionist]] [[Kalah]], who transformed the tent's interior into a fanciful tower filled with guests and performers, ensorcelled to appear as monsters. Giran's mother was trapped inside, transformed into a [[giant spider]]. The child was left outside of the spellbound tent, crying for his missing mother. When the illusion was broken and the gnome defeated, Giran was reunited with Hannah.
